importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: The date when the article was updated, indicating the most current information on Biden's treatment status.
The date when Biden's personal office confirmed his diagnosis of aggressive prostate cancer that had spread to his bones.
The approximate time when Biden began a pill regimen for prostate cancer treatment, preceding radiation therapy.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: The period during which Biden underwent diagnosis, initial treatment (pill regimen), and completed radiation therapy, showing progression of his cancer care.
The period when Biden began a pill treatment for prostate cancer, marking the beginning of active medical intervention.

keyTakeAways: Former President Joe Biden has completed a full course of radiation therapy for prostate cancer, which had spread to his bones.
He previously began a pill regimen earlier this year and underwent Mohs surgery for skin cancer.
Biden's daughter Ashley shared a video and photo celebrating the completion of radiation therapy, expressing gratitude to medical staff.
The treatment is part of managing an aggressive form of prostate cancer, with ongoing uncertainty about future steps.
Biden remains active in public life, scheduled to speak at events including the Edward M. Kennedy Institute and an event for the Nebraska Democratic Party.
Biden expressed optimism about overcoming his illness, stating that the cancer had not penetrated vital organs and that his bones were strong.

summaryOfNewsArticle: Former President Joe Biden has completed a full course of radiation therapy for an aggressive form of prostate cancer that had spread to his bones. He previously began a pill regimen earlier in the year and underwent Mohs surgery for skin cancer. The treatment progress was shared publicly by his daughter Ashley, who posted a video and photo celebrating the milestone with his wife Jill and grandchildren. Biden expressed optimism about overcoming the illness, citing strong bone health and early-stage progression. Despite completing radiation therapy, future treatment plans remain unclear. He remains active in public life, scheduled to speak at events including the Edward M. Kennedy Institute and for the Nebraska Democratic Party.
title: Biden completes a course of radiation therapy for cancer treatment
